commitResults.messageTitle: Rename chatbot name from Duke to Paradox and update related references; Complete Level-0 tasks
commitResults.messageBody: Implement an initial skeletal version of the chatbot Paradox that simply greets the user and exits.

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement echo functionality for user input and improve welcome/exit messages
commitResults.messageBody: exit the program only when user type "bye"

commitResults.messageTitle: Add task list functionality with add and list commands
Add Task and TaskList classes; implement mark and unmark commands for tasks
Add support for todo, deadline, and event tasks with corresponding classes and command handling
Update UI output formatting and input handling; add sample input and expected output files
commitResults.messageBody: Test using the I/O redirection technique

commitResults.messageTitle: Add custom exception handling for task commands; improve error messages and input validation
Add delete command for tasks; update TaskList to use ArrayList and support task removal
Refactor: move files into packages for better project structure
Feature: add persistent storage for tasks; implement file write in TaskList after changes are made and support loading tasks on startup
Feature: add persistent storage for tasks
Refactor: extract task list file R/W operations to TaskListStorage; update TaskList to use new storage class and simplify logic
Feature: support date and time parsing for deadline and event tasks; update storage and display formats for improved consistency
Merge branch 'branch-Level-8'
Refactor: introduce Command pattern for user actions; add dedicated command classes and parser for improved OOP structure
Refactor: move Command and Task classes into dedicated packages; update imports for improved project structure
Refactor: rename Task.done to isDone for clarity
Merge branch 'add-gradle-support'
Refactor: reorganize add command classes; introduce InvalidTaskTypeException; improve task type validation
commitResults.messageBody:
- Move AddTodoCommand, AddDeadlineCommand, and AddEventCommand to app.model.command package and update imports
- Add InvalidTaskTypeException for clearer error handling of unsupported task types
- Update TaskList to throw InvalidTaskTypeException for invalid task types in addTask
- Make fields in TodoTask, DeadlineTask, and EventTask private for better encapsulation
- Update TaskType enum formatting
- Add checkstyle plugin and configuration for code style enforcement
- Update build.gradle to set main class and enable checkstyle
- Add suppressions.xml for test file Javadoc checks

commitResults.messageTitle: Test: add unit tests for UserInputParser and TaskListStorage; introduce StubTodoTask for testing
Gradle: update shadowJar base name to 'paradox' and set version to v0.1.0
Fix: update task list file path to resources directory in Paradox.java
Docs: add JavaDoc comments for commands, tasks, exceptions, and TaskList classes
Refactor: improve import ordering and line wrapping for code readability
Docs: update README with note on using Copilot for coding standard adjustments
Feature: implement find command to search tasks by keyword
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add FindTaskCommand to handle 'find' user input
- Update Task, TodoTask, DeadlineTask, and EventTask with contains() method for keyword matching
- Extend TaskList with printMatchedList() to display matching tasks
- Integrate find command parsing in UserInputParser

Some of the classes have unsound input validations.

Adding assertions for storage parser classes and task classes etc.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge pull request #1 from WANG-YIDA/branch-A-Assertions
Refactor: extract and insert task processors and parsers into separate methods
commitResults.messageBody:
The task processors and parsers in methods of classes StorageStringParser and TaskList make long methods.

Extracting the processors and parsers for different tasks into separate methods to avoid long methods and increase readability.
